articles.title: Balbir Singh: Not a household name, yet one of the greatest Olympians - The Indian Express
articles.description: A goal-scoring machine from the days when hockey was played on grass, Balbir Singh Sr won three Olympic golds — 1948, 1952 and 1956 — and was India’s most-decorated athlete ever.
articles.content:
Written by Mihir Vasavda

Updated: May 27, 2020 8:23:15 am
